projects.title: Pacework Crew
fullDescription: Pacework Crew is a Pune-based fitness club built by three enthusiasts on a mission to pull you out of unhealthy habits. A community where consistency becomes your lifestyle.

projects.title: Trishakti Homestay
projects.description: Guwahati based homestay run by three dynamic women
fullDescription: This logo was designed to capture the essence of Trishakti Homestay - a space built and run by three remarkable women: a mother and her two daughters. The name Trishakti reflects their unity, confidence, and the deep bond they share. The warm, welcoming colors mirror the atmosphere they have created - a home that is inviting, full of character, and rooted in Assam's charm. More than just a design, this logo tells their story of family, dedication, and heartfelt hospitality.

projects.title: Old Age Oasis
projects.description: Communal living for the elderly at Rourkela

projects.title: Arch-Veda
projects.description: A venture that explores the dynamic worlds of art, architecture, and culture.
fullDescription: The logo merges the letter ‘a’ with the Hindi alphabet ‘वे,’ representing the fusion of modern and traditional influences. Additionally, the design has been transformed into a repeating pattern, symbolizing the continuous dialogue between these creative disciplines.
